IV.i.1.A.title:
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Duty to Assist With Providing a Medical Examination or Opinion

This section describes the duty to assist with Department of Veterans Affairs examinations and medical opinions, including timing and documenting status reviews.

V.ii.4.A.title:
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Effective Dates

This section includes policies and procedures to supplement regulatory guidance on assignment of effective dates.

III.ii.2.B.title:
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Procedures for Obtaining Service Treatment Records (STRs)

This chapter provides information on the procedures for requesting service treatment records.

VIII.i.1.A.title:
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on Claims Based on Herbicide Exposure

This section contains general information on claims based on herbicide exposure.
